summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 68th Street, from 32nd Avenue Northwest to 35th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7363, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
